channel.title: NYT > Technology
channel.description: Technology industry news, commentary, and analysis, with reporting on big tech, startups, and internet culture. The New York Times is a hub for conversation about news and ideas.

item.description: It can be easier to talk to strangers, which might explain why Reddit has become an increasingly popular resource for wedding planning.
